#set src files list


#set zlog include directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_ZLOG_INCLUDE_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/zlog/linux/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/include)
#set libuv directory
#SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBUV_INCLUDE_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/libuv-v1.11.0/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/include)
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBUV_INCLUDE_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/libuv-v1.11.0/include)
#set iniparser directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_INIPARSER_INCLUDE_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/iniparser/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/include)
#set libuuid-1.0.3 directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBUUID_INCLUDE_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/libuuid-1.0.3/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/include)
#set gmf parse directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_GMF_PARSE_INCLUDE_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/gmf_parser/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/include)
#set libxml2-2.9.4 directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBXML2_INCLUDE_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/libxml2-2.9.4/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/include/libxml2)
#set liblfds710 directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBLFDS710_INCLUDE_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/liblfds/liblfds7.1.0_Linux/liblfds710/bin/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/include)
#set ortp-0.24.0 directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBORTP_INCLUDE_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/ortp-0.24.0/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/include)
#set ffmpeg-3.2 directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBFFMPEG_INCLUDE_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/ffmpeg-3.2/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/include)
#set SDL2 directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBSDL2_INCLUDE_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/SDL2-2.0.4/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/include/SDL2)
#set goahead-3.6.3 directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_GOAHEAD_INCLUDE_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/goahead-3.6.3/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/inc)
#set x264-snapshot-20161110-2245 directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_X264_INCLUDE_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/x264-snapshot-20161110-2245/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/include)


#set zlog lib directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_ZLOG_LIB_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/zlog/linux/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/lib)
#set libuv directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBUV_LIB_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/libuv-v1.11.0/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/lib)
#set iniparser directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_INIPARSER_LIB_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/iniparser/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/lib)
#set libuuid-1.0.3 directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBUUID_LIB_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/libuuid-1.0.3/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/lib)
#set gmf parse directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_GMF_PARSE_LIB_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/gmf_parser/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/lib)


#set libiconv-1.14 directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBICONV_LIB_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/libiconv-1.14/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/lib)
#set zlib-1.2.8 directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBZLIB_LIB_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/zlib-1.2.8/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/lib)
#set xz-5.2.2 directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBXZ_LIB_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/xz-5.2.2/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/lib)


#set libxml2-2.9.4 directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBXML2_LIB_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/libxml2-2.9.4/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/lib)
#set liblfds710 directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBLFDS710_LIB_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/liblfds/liblfds7.1.0_Linux/liblfds710/bin/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/lib)
#set ortp-0.24.0 directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBORTP_LIB_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/ortp-0.24.0/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/lib)
#set ffmpeg-3.2 directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBFFMPEG_LIB_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/ffmpeg-3.2/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/lib)
#set SDL2 directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBSDL2_LIB_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/SDL2-2.0.4/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/lib)
#set goahead-3.6.3 directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_GOAHEAD_LIB_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/goahead-3.6.3/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/bin)
#set x264-snapshot-20161110-2245 directory
SET(CP_THIRD_PARTY_X264_LIB_DIR ${CP_THIRD_PARTY_DIR}/x264-snapshot-20161110-2245/build_lib/${CP_THIRD_PARTY_PLATFORM_NAME}/lib)




#add include dir
SET(CP_INCLUDE_DIR ${CP_INCLUDE_DIR} 
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_ZLOG_INCLUDE_DIR}
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBUV_INCLUDE_DIR}
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_INIPARSER_INCLUDE_DIR}
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBUUID_INCLUDE_DIR}
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_GMF_PARSE_INCLUDE_DIR}	
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBXML2_INCLUDE_DIR}
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBLFDS710_INCLUDE_DIR}
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBORTP_INCLUDE_DIR}
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBFFMPEG_INCLUDE_DIR}
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBSDL2_INCLUDE_DIR}
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_GOAHEAD_INCLUDE_DIR}
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_X264_INCLUDE_DIR}
	
	PARENT_SCOPE
	
	)



#add lib dir
SET(CP_LIBRARY_DIR ${CP_LIBRARY_DIR} 
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_ZLOG_LIB_DIR}
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBUV_LIB_DIR}
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_INIPARSER_LIB_DIR}
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBUUID_LIB_DIR}
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_GMF_PARSE_LIB_DIR}
	
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBICONV_LIB_DIR}
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBZLIB_LIB_DIR}
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBXZ_LIB_DIR}
	
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBXML2_LIB_DIR}
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBLFDS710_LIB_DIR}
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBORTP_LIB_DIR}
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBFFMPEG_LIB_DIR}
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_LIBSDL2_LIB_DIR}
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_GOAHEAD_LIB_DIR}
	${CP_THIRD_PARTY_X264_LIB_DIR}
	
	PARENT_SCOPE
	
	)
